name: Hemp Seed Soup
author: LORIKAE
summary: This is an incredibly old recipe that I adapted from and old Latin text. Measurements were originally listed by weight, but I rounded them to approximate volumes. Either way, they are super flexible as it is a soup, so adjust however you like.
ingredients: 1 cube vegetable bouillon, or more to taste
¼ pound fresh mushrooms, finely chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
directions: Bring water to a boil in a large pot and add vegetable bouillon to taste
Add lentils and bay leaves and simmer for 15 minutes
Add carrots, mushrooms, salt, and pepper; continue to simmer
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion until soft, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and saute until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Stir onion mixture into the soup
Cook and stir hemp seeds in a separate skillet over medium-high heat until toasted and fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes
Stir toasted hemp seeds into soup
Add cilantro and cook 5 minutes more
